headline.print_headline: Amazon Opens Prime to Monthly Subscriptions in Move to Challenge Netflix
headline.main: Amazon Challenges Netflix by Opening Prime to Monthly Subscribers

snippet: One new plan offers video streaming only, while another offers full Prime benefits. Both cost more than annual subscribers pay.
abstract: Amazon informs customers that it will begin offering two monthly price plans for its Prime service, replacing previous annual plan; new choices, one dedicated to video streaming and the second offering expedited shipping and other options, will not save customers money; change is meant to position Amazon as more robust competitor to other online streaming video services.
